hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for trying out the platform

forFreelancers.title: For Freelancers
forFreelancers.subtitle: Keep more of what you earn

fee.title: Service Fee
fee.description: One simple fee on all earnings
fee.details: We charge a flat 10% service fee on all payments. No hidden costs, no surprises.

q1.question: How do payments work?
q1.answer: Clients fund escrow before work begins. Payment is released when milestones are approved. Freelancers can withdraw to bank or Stripe.

q2.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q2.answer: No. Clients pay a small processing fee (2.9% + €0.30). Freelancers pay only the 10% service fee.

q3.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime. Your subscription remains active until the end of the billing period.

q4.question: Do you offer refunds?
q4.answer: We offer dispute resolution for projects. If work isn't delivered as agreed, clients can request mediation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're building the future of work by connecting talented freelancers with businesses that need them, powered by AI that understands both sides.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Carphatian was born from frustration with traditional freelancing platforms. Too much time wasted on searching, too many mismatches, too little trust.
story.p2: We asked: what if AI could understand exactly what you need and find the perfect match instantly? What if the entire process—from posting a job to getting paid—was seamless and secure?
story.p3: That's what we've built. A platform where AI does the heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters: doing great work.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear pricing, honest communication, no hidden agendas.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We vet every freelancer and maintain high standards.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Constantly improving our AI to serve you better.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Secure payments and fair dispute resolution.
